name: niuma-logs
title: Niuma Logs
description: Every log line tells the story of a cyber workhorse.
author: mapleeit

commands.name: create-task
commands.title: Start Task
commands.subtitle: — New work just came in
commands.description: Create a new task and record it as an issue in a CNB repository.

commands.name: complete-task
commands.title: Complete Task
commands.subtitle: — Another task completed
commands.description: Mark a task as completed and record it as an issue in a CNB repository.

commands.name: review-tasks
commands.title: Review Tasks
commands.subtitle: — See where the time went
commands.description: View all task records. This command opens a Gantt-style task board in a CNB repository to review durations and completion status.

preferences.name: repo
preferences.title: Repo
preferences.description: Select the Git repository where tasks are stored.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
